function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'merge' to reach function 'printf'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < n1' is never executed?

dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < n1' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'A (line 2)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'p (line 2)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'q (line 2)' live at the end of function 'merge'?
Does variable 'right' remain in use at the end of function 'merge'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'right[i] = A[q + i + 1];' be considered dead code?
